00229    /*
00230    * Is this atom Tethered ?
00231    */ 
00232    inline bool TetherMaster::isTethered(const Atom& atom) const
00233    {  return (tetherPtrs_[atom.id()]); }
00234 
00238    inline Tether& TetherMaster::tether(const Atom& atom) const
00239    {  
00240       assert(tetherPtrs_[atom.id()]);
00241       return (*tetherPtrs_[atom.id()]); 
00242    }
00243 
00244    /*
00245    * Get an active tether by index.
00246    */ 
00247    inline Tether& TetherMaster::tether(int id) const
00248    {  return tetherSet_[id]; }
00249 
00250    /*
00251    * Get number of active Tethers.
00252    */ 
00253    inline int TetherMaster::nTether() const
00254    {  return tetherSet_.size(); }
